attributes.action: Windfall tax on organisations who ‘furlough’ staff, yet pay anyone >£100,000
attributes.additional_details: Please do this because otherwise this government subsidy is used to  enable high salaries to be maintained. The pain of this epidemic must be shared by all individuals.
attributes.background: Apply a windfall tax to ALL organisations who pay any Director or Employee or Consultant more than £100,000 per annum pro rata for the period where staff are ‘furloughed’ to claim government salary support. As already suggested re football clubs.
